scripts.preobfuscate: echo 'Make sure original files exist locally'
scripts.obfuscate: javascript-obfuscator js/data.js --output js/data-obfuscated.js && javascript-obfuscator js/formulas.js --output js/formulas-obfuscated.js
scripts.netlify-build: echo 'Using pre-obfuscated files - no build needed'
